version_description:
* Ability to buy 4k size video
* Bug fixes

* Ability to buy 4k size video
* Bug fixes

* Added support for 14 new languages - Czech, Greek, German, Spanish, Hungarian, Italian, Korean, Dutch, Portuguese(BRA), Portuguese(PORT), Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Chinese (Simplified)
* Updated advanced search view

* Added support for 14 new languages - Czech, Greek, German, Spanish, Hungarian, Italian, Korean, Dutch, Portuguese(BRA), Portuguese(PORT), Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Chinese (Simplified)
* Updated advanced search view

* New Advanced Search
* Security updates
* Stability improvements
* Japanese language support

* New Advanced Search
* Security updates
* Stability improvements
* Japanese language support
* Added support for On Demand Downloads
* Added support for On Demand Downloads
* Bug fixes and overall stability improvements
* Bug fixes and overall stability improvements
* Stability improvements in Favorites and Purchases sections.
* Stability improvements in Favorites and Purchases sections.

We went one step further and completely redesigned the Depositphotos App. It now consists of the latest iOS technologies and an improved user experience. We prioritized performance and user experience and hope you enjoy the new and improved version.

- We completely redesigned the Home screen.
* Access your recently viewed files and recent searches.
* Discover new files from a list of the world's top contributors.
* Check out our list of free files.
* The newest files and latest collections are always available to you.
- Managing and downloading your files has never been easier. Check out our brand new function - Download Manager.
- The navigation menu has been redesigned and now includes improved functions.
- You can easily manage your profile.
- "Favourites" and "Plans" tabs have been redesigned.
- You can now access more detailed information about your downloaded files with a list view.
- Quickly contact our support team without filling out a long form.

We went one step further and completely redesigned the Depositphotos App. It now consists of the latest iOS technologies and an improved user experience. We prioritized performance and user experience and hope you enjoy the new and improved version.

- We completely redesigned the Home screen.
* Access your recently viewed files and recent searches.

* The newest files and latest collections are always available to you.
- Managing and downloading your files has never been easier. Check out our brand new function - Download Manager.
- The navigation menu has been redesigned and now includes improved functions.
- You can easily manage your profile.
- "Favourites" and "Plans" tabs have been redesigned.
- You can now access more detailed information about your downloaded files with a list view.
- Quickly contact our support team without filling out a long form.

- Basic data caching improvements
- Stability improvements

- Basic data caching improvements

* New flexible plans
- No annual commitment
- Unused downloads transfer to the next month
- Full access to our library
- Download photos and vectors (JPG, EPS and AI)
